pages.text: $(bred)ScreenDoor Zombie$() got its door from the last house it visited, $(m)after it ate the houseowner's brain$().$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)24$()$(br)$(bred)Door Health$() : $(l)200$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : although it has $(bred)pretty tough door defence$(), but it has low health itself.
